sql.name: knowhowsustainaccidenttypemonth
sql.item: select (select count( t.c1) from {100} t where 1=1 {5}) as 工单数量, (select count(distinct t.c1) from {100} t where t.c700000014='交换' {5}) as 交换, (select count(distinct t.c1) from {100} t where t.c700000014='传输' {5}) as 传输, (select count(distinct t.c1) from {100} t where (t.c700000014='数据' or t.c700000014='IP承载网' or t.c700000014='CMNET' or t.c700000014='CMNET' or t.c700000014='WLAN' or t.c700000014='WAP') {5}) as 数据 from dual
